name: Chicken Cordon Bleu Casserole
ingredients: 1 pound boneless chicken breasts or tenders, cut into bite-size pieces

instructions.en: Put chicken, ham and cheese in a greased 12x7" baking dish. Season with salt and pepper.
Blend heavy cream into cream cheese until smooth. Stir in garlic, pepper, dill, chives and parsley.
Pour cream cheese mixture over meat and cheese. Stir everything together.
Bake at 350ยบ for about 40 minutes until bubbly and chicken is fully cooked.
Let stand about 10 minutes before serving to allow liquid to soak back into the sauce.

notes: Makes about 4-6 servings. Chicken can be added raw or pre-cooked. If using pre-cooked chicken, reduce baking time to 20-30 minutes.
